comment.author: 24595374@N05
comment._content:
Dear State Library of New South Wales:
If New South Wales knew how much fun it was to transform these photos, they probably would assess me with a pleasure tax. I'm trying to achieve as realistic a sensation/experience as possible. Wouldn't it be great if people could experience something as if they were actually there?  
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/24595374@N05/6632906475/in/photostream]
Incidentally,  I perhaps failed to mention that I am engaged in a photo and blog-a-thon, which explains my interest in your photos. Anyway, mush on Huskies! From Houston, Texas.

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content:
Glad to hear you are having so much fun.  It is great to see what you are doing with the photographs.

Ellen
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
